name: Deadtective
description:
A house party gone wrong in an older era. A Master of the manor and his Maid, Murdered. Possible cult involvement according to your chief. Interdimensional Ghost Detective Patty Geist is on the case!

Art by Christian Laklia

Scripting and Unity Inplementation by Christopher Dearman

Planning and Direction by James Coventry

Narrative Design by Milo Seaman

QA Testing by Thomas Cookman
